## Genetic fine-mapping for summary-level data

<img src="figures/finimom.png" style="width:12.5%; margin-left: 20px" align="right">

I am the author and maintainer of *finimom*, an R package for fine-mapping genetic summary data
using a non-local prior. Package website: [https://github.com/vkarhune/finimom](https://github.com/vkarhune/finimom).

\

### Other

I am a contributor to *MendelianRandomization* R package. Package website: [https://cran.r-project.org/package=MendelianRandomization](https://cran.r-project.org/package=MendelianRandomization).
